sentences.sContent: We do not belong to it.
But I do not value my good looks; I only like to have them because they belong to you, my dear, and that there may be at least one thing about me worth your having.
sentences.sCn: 但是我并不重视我的容貌，我还愿意拥有我的容貌，只是因为这容貌属于你，我亲爱的，只是因为我也许至少还有一样东西值得你拥有。

trans.tranOther: if something belongs to someone, they own it
